scripts.agent:build: pushd "../shared/agent" && npm run build -- --ide vs && popd
scripts.agent:rebuild: pushd "../shared/agent" && npm run rebuild -- --ide vs && popd
scripts.agent:watch: pushd "../shared/agent" && npm run watch -- --ide vs && popd
scripts.bundle:ci: npm run clean:ci && npm run bundle
scripts.bundle: npm install --no-save && npm run webview:verify && npm run agent:bundle && tsx esbuild.ts --prod
scripts.clean:ci: git clean -xdf -e vs/licenses/**/* && npm run webview:clean:ci && npm run agent:clean:ci
scripts.preinstall: pushd "../shared/ui" && npm install --no-save && popd && pushd "../shared/util" && npm install --no-save && popd
scripts.rebuild: npm install --no-save && npm run agent:rebuild && npm run build
scripts.webview:verify: tsx esbuild.ts --only-symlinks && pushd "../shared/ui" && npm run verify:compile && popd
